title: Could someone from RIOT please help :(
body:
About 4 months ago I  received an email from riot stating that my account had been banned for the use of 3rd party programs despite my account not being active at the time, at  first I thought there had been some kind of mistake as I've had this account for a long time and havn't had any previous issues. So the first thing I did was to check my match history only to find that my account had been in use. So i quickly changed my password and angrily sent a ticket to Riot support. Only to get a generic message sent back stating that my account had broken the rules and is indefinitely suspended. I asked player support again to please look over the situation once more, as I've had this account for a long time and have been playing from the same location for about 3 years. Could they not check to see a change in the IP? But alas no help, just another generic message telling me nothing I couldn't have found on the player support page myself. Then I searched the Internet for anyone with a similar issue and I found a few, but none of them were able to fix it. So I gave up and sadly uninstalled my game.

Today one of my friends brought to my attention a forum post with a very similar issue had his account recovered. So here I am with what will probably be my last attempt at trying to recover my account.  I would really like to start playing league again but I don't want to start over. I've met so many friends on that account, got all the characters and spent a heap of money on skins. Starting over wouldn't be worth it, a new account could never hold the same value.

replies.body: All is good a rioter sent me a ticket and fixed everything :)
